QuestData.Title: Sworn to Protect
QuestData.Description: My duty here has been fulfilled as best it can. Send word to Malfurion that I'll be joining him soon.$B$BGood luck to you, $n. Good luck to all of us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Malfurion Stormrage at the Eye of the Vortex in Darkshore.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job, $n! Selenn's help in holding back the vortex will be invaluable.
